entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this afternoon then periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
